bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with chu nuo 搐搦 , convulsions. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百 病主治藥:井泉石，產後搦搐 , “ Jing quan shi [cures] grabbing and jerking following delivery”. This is the only occurrence of nuo chu 搦搐 in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 . It may be an early scribal error for in the paragraph on jing quan shi 井泉石 itself the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 has the common wording 產後搐搦 .
